sn11.12:1.3: “sakko, bhikkhave, devanamindo pubbe manussabhuto samano magho nama manavo ahosi, tasma maghavati vuccati.
sn11.12:2.1: Sakko, bhikkhave, devanamindo pubbe manussabhuto samano pure danam adasi, tasma purindadoti vuccati.
sn11.12:3.1: Sakko, bhikkhave, devanamindo pubbe manussabhuto samano sakkaccam danam adasi, tasma sakkoti vuccati.
sn11.12:4.1: Sakko, bhikkhave, devanamindo pubbe manussabhuto samano avasatham adasi, tasma vasavoti vuccati.
sn11.12:5.1: Sakko, bhikkhave, devanamindo sahassampi atthanam muhuttena cinteti, tasma sahassakkhoti vuccati.
sn11.12:6.1: Sakkassa, bhikkhave, devanamindassa suja nama asurakanna pajapati, tasma sujampatiti vuccati.
sn11.12:7.1: Sakko, bhikkhave, devanamindo devanam tavatimsanam issariyadhipaccam rajjam kareti, tasma devanamindoti vuccati.
sn11.12:8.1: Sakkassa, bhikkhave, devanamindassa pubbe manussabhutassa satta vatapadani samattani samadinnani ahesum, yesam samadinnatta sakko sakkattam ajjhaga.
sn11.12:8.7: yavajivam vigatamalamaccherena cetasa agaram ajjhavaseyyam muttacago payatapani vossaggarato yacayogo danasamvibhagarato,
sn11.12:8.9: yavajivam akkodhano assam—sacepi me kodho uppajjeyya, khippameva nam pativineyyanti.
sn11.12:8.10: Sakkassa, bhikkhave, devanamindassa pubbe manussabhutassa imani satta vatapadani samattani samadinnani ahesum, yesam samadinnatta sakko sakkattam ajjhagati.
